target.code:
from sympy import sympify, sin, cos, tan, rad

def calculate_expression(expression):
    expr = sympify(expression)
    return expr
target.description: Evaluate a mathematical expression involving trigonometric functions.
target.name: calculate_expression

target.code:
from sympy import sin, cos, tan, pi

def evaluate_trig_identity(A, B):
    # Calculate angles in radians
    radians_A = A * pi/180
    radians_B = B * pi/180
    # Calculate identities
    sin_A = sin(radians_A)
    cos_A = cos(radians_A)
    tan_A = tan(radians_A)
    sin_B = sin(radians_B)
    cos_B = cos(radians_B)
    tan_B = tan(radians_B)
    return sin_A, cos_A, tan_A, sin_B, cos_B, tan_B
target.description: Evaluate a trigonometric identity based on the input values or angles.
target.name: evaluate_trig_identity
